website_summaries.verdict: Despite a few concerns, these are well-made curtains that are worth considering if you need serious light blocking.
pros: Made of thick material that's considered theater-grade quality
Available in pocket and grommet styles
cons: Heavy, so you'll need a durable rod

customer_reviews.title: Careful how you order!
customer_reviews.text: The curtain itself is wonderful. Full Blackout. Look more expensive than they are but I ordered what I thought was two sets. I received two panels. At that price for one panel, not as good of a deal.
customer_reviews.author: B. Allen

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these curtain panels (stone color) to put over my windows that already have blinds to block out noise, light and heat. So far for blocking light and noise it has been perfect. Still waiting to see if it blocks out the heat. My window gets the afternoon extreme heat which turns the room into an oven during temps over 85+. Hopefully I don't have to have my portable cooler running at high blast this summer. The only issue I have so far is the wrinkles in the curtain panels. I'll probably have to use a hand streamer to get them out.
customer_reviews.author: RMixa

customer_reviews.title: Whoa...actual affordable blackout curtains?!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Grommets slide easily, room is PITCH BLACK when these are closed during full sun, and the price is terrific. They are heavy and appear well-made. Would absolutely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: True Blackout Curtains
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been trying to find the right dark grey for my room and these were perfect. I love the fabric, the look and the way they completely blackout the room, which isn’t what I’ve experienced with other brands. My only complaint is that I ordered four panels. One of them was in a different package and the fabric didn’t match the other three. Amazon quickly processed an exchange and all is well, but I’m not a fan of the extra time I had to put into it.
customer_reviews.author: mollykins

customer_reviews.title: NO REGRETS!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love looooooove! Color is so rich and beautiful. Material is silky smooth and doesn't have that over-the-top annoying shimmer. Put up without washing and wrinkles fell out in 2 days. Completely blackout. I bought 3 more. Five stars all day all the way!
customer_reviews.author: Kassandra D.

customer_reviews.title: Works great for blocking out the sun but
customer_reviews.text: I bought these black out curtains because I started working the night shift. They work great for that. Unfortunately, the curtain makes room super warm and are not wrinkle free. I bought one assuming that they would come in a pair. I should have read Into detail. I bought the same size again but they’re off by 2 inches.
customer_reviews.author: Toto

customer_reviews.title: Curtains made of quality material and good weight.
customer_reviews.text: These curtains are quality made with some good weight. I am really satisfied with my purchase. These curtains are machine washable but I don't think I will have to wash them any time soon. I wish the round metal gourmets where black instead of silver. Other than that these curtains are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: David W

customer_reviews.title: Great material
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Been shopping for curtains online and I store for a month now. Had hard time finding reasonable prices and 100% blackout. For the price it’s is definitely a steal!!! Was afraid the color would be off upon arrival but it was true to the picture. I purchased grey and haze. Blocks out all light, has a nice silky look without being shinny. Would def recommend. Will buy for other rooms Wrinkles are how they came, I did not steam them out yet, I wanted to see how the colors looked first. Not a big deal to me, I’m sure they won’t b difficult to remove
customer_reviews.author: Brittani

customer_reviews.title: Sun Zero - How do I love thee?  Let me count the ways!
customer_reviews.text: Omg, I love these curtains! I have a bedroom with a window by my bed that faces directly eastward. Forget about sleeping past dawn. I put these up late yesterday afternoon, and I was able to sleep past 5:30 am this morning! Yay! I think they are beautiful, silky, heavy curtains. They did come with some wrinkles, but they easily smoothed out after a few hours. As far as I can tell, they blocked 100% of the light from that window. They were easy to install. I may have to order a pair for my other window! Be aware, these are individual panels, so you have to order two of them, but they are sooo worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Sneakypie

customer_reviews.title: These. Drapes are Great!
customer_reviews.text: These drapes blocks the sunlight and darkens the room. They block unwanted air drafts from window.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blocks out light
customer_reviews.text: These drapes are a very nice material. The Black backing really does block out the light. They are in our baby nursery and so far have kept the room cooler and still look great in the blush rose!
customer_reviews.author: Harris

customer_reviews.title: NOT as described, instead they’re 52”x94”
customer_reviews.text: The panels are lovely BUT are NOT as described; they’re an inch off. I am gravely disappointed because we were excited and took the time to set up the iron rod 2 days prior, expecting the curtains to be the accurate size, but they’re off by an inch. This poses the problem that light is now coming in when it wouldn’t IF they were 95”. Now we need to decide whether we redo the iron rod and drill more holes OR return the product. I’m not sure which is more of a hassle. They’re also not wrinkle free as described.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking Curtains
customer_reviews.text: Great valued curtains, this was one of my first DIY projects at home and I am very happy with how everything turned out. I managed to get everything to line up flush with the ground, just half an inch over the floor. The only downside I saw with these curtains are that the wrinkles have not yet fully gotten out after almost 2 months. The color and quality are great, they do fully block out light, but just soemthing to keep in mind is that you will need other methods to block out light on the sides and top.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C

customer_reviews.title: Nice and thick
customer_reviews.text: I bought this used but it looked new coming out of the packaging. It was slightly wrinkled but I don't care about that. You can see how pink it is next to the other pink things in my room. The back side is black. I am overall satisfied with my purchase. It is yet to be seen how much energy it saves. There's only one panel in the bag. I didn't need more than one. Just FYI. (I do not know why I cannot add pictures to this. GRRRR!)
customer_reviews.author: Cha'kwaina

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item came.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one previously and the curtain is fine, it is a black out but some light comes through the side. So I decided to order another panel to avoid using one panel to cover the entire window. My second purchase arrived fast but the length was incorrect. I selected the correct length to match my first order. I received an 84inch instead of 95. It’s such an inconvenience. I have to repack and take to ups. I online online so that I do not have to worry about the inconvenience of having to drive to the store, especially with just having a baby.
customer_reviews.author: Fatima

customer_reviews.title: TOTAL BLACK OUT. THESE ARE AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure about the other colors but the black are completely and totally black out which is exactly what I wanted. In the morning, the sun shines directly in my bedroom window, making it hard to sleep past 6am. These curtains keep my room almost completely dark besides a tiny bit of light that comes through the top. These are amazing and totally worth it. These are also very reasonably priced compared to other black out curtains. Get these. You will not regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Kosowski

customer_reviews.title: Smell horrible ! Beware
customer_reviews.text: I really disliked the smell of these curtains. Smelled sour once sun heated up curtain. Had to dry heave while removing them. Tried to soak in vinegar and smell remained. While soaking , rings rusted :(. Guess I go back to a bright room and I’m out of the money for 2 panels.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Afternoon Naps!
customer_reviews.text: I have these curtains on 3 windows in my bedroom. They can turn even the brightest room into a dark place. Great if you need a dark place to nap or in a home theater room.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Description is messed up and received the wrong size.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this same curtain last year and loved it !! I ordered 4 more 2 weeks ago the same length 52x84. Per the description I assumed I ordered the right size. However, despite the fact I selected 52x84 I received 52x95. A complete mix up and such a struggle to return. Amazon can you fix this problem with the selection choice so i canorder the right size ???
customer_reviews.author: M Tandy

customer_reviews.title: 100% blackout is perfect if you are sensitive to light
customer_reviews.text: This curtain rocks. I am a light sleeper and little noise and light would wakes me up. Go tthis curtain since my ol done was not a 100% blackout. After switching it out, boy, I can see the difference. There was literally no light going through the curtain anymore. YES! Why didn't I get this sooner?! If you want a very dark room to sleep in during the day, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Tong

customer_reviews.title: Not 100% blackout.
customer_reviews.text: We put these in a bedroom that gets almost full sun for about 90% of the day because it only shares one wall with our house. It does drastically change how hot it gets in that room throughout the day when we keep the curtains closed. However, they are not 100% blackout by any means. They do block out quite a bit but we won't be sleeping in late anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Shavlik

customer_reviews.title: If you need only one panel
customer_reviews.text: These do a great job of blocking the light. they are a bit wrinkly out of the package but I just put them in the wrinkle cycle in the dryer for 20 minutes and they hung just fine. By the way they are way cheaper by the pair - search for Sun Zero Nordic. I bought two pair of the Nordic which are identical to this but I just needed one more panel.
customer_reviews.author: B. Howard

customer_reviews.title: TRUE Blackout!
customer_reviews.text: I love these curtains. I wish they were available in smaller sizes, like for valances, and also with pole pockets instead of grommets. The material quality is superb and they really are 100% blackout, or at least 99%. I bought this for use in my Honda Element micro RV to divide the front seats from the rear.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: 6 Panels and all different lengths! Beware!
customer_reviews.text: What a nightmare! I ordered 6 panels of the curtains, this brand is sold at various stores so not a fly by night China product. After spending almost 2 hours ironing the extensive wrinkles out and hanging the curtains, I noticed that each of the 6 panels were differing in length up to 1 1/2 inches. I ordered more and still I got different lengths. Don't waste your time like I did!
customer_reviews.author: DLo

customer_reviews.title: Good but short
customer_reviews.text: they do block out the light really well if they fit the window properly. They are actually an inch shorter than described which wouldn't be a big deal but an inch of full morning sunshine is pretty bright for a day sleeper. A longer set would probably be best for anyone wanting them. Color is great and fabric looks high quality but is light weight. very wrinkly out of package doesn't improve after hanging will need too iron to smooth out. overall Appearance is good and it would work great if the proper length.
customer_reviews.author: Lebro

customer_reviews.title: Pitch black and cool
customer_reviews.text: So I bought these because I work third shift often and need to have complete darkness in my room so that I can sleep. Do these curtains accomplish this goal? ABSOLUTELY! I also decided to spend a little extra for a pink curtains and they look GREAT! My room is about 20 degrees cooler as well compared to the room without black out curtains. However if you are looking for curtains that dull sounds from the outside, I wouldn’t say this product serves this purpose unfortunately. However it absolutely makes my room pitch black and cool. I love them and will absolutely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Szatkowski

customer_reviews.title: Good value and they do the job!
customer_reviews.text: These black out light totally! And help with noise too. I got the "pearl' which I wanted to be off white but they are light gray/silver (maybe "oyster"?) but they totally work in the room so I kept them. They have been great. They lose some wrinkles after a while, but I broke down and ended up ironing them (my steamer really didn't do much good). They help a lot, and they even help with noise. I know I am sleeping better! Natural light wakes me up, and no more--why did I wait so long?! Wish they came with care instructions.
customer_reviews.author: ECLC

customer_reviews.title: Dark room
customer_reviews.text: My room is so dark it’s really nice when it’s a lightning storm
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Description needs to be more specific with how many panels or is it a set.
customer_reviews.text: I love the curtains however I ordered 2 thinking I was ordering 2 sets a total of what I thought would be 4 panels but it didn’t specify that it’s only one panel. Not sure why anyone would buy one curtain it’s not a shower curtain. Was disappointed to find out I had to order 2 more panels and that the price wasn’t as awesome as I thought.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Wilson

customer_reviews.title: There is only ONE panel!
customer_reviews.text: For the price I thought it was a pair!! Who only buys one!!?? I cannot believe it spent this much money on one panel! Ridiculous! The color is perfect and it does block out light.
customer_reviews.author: JShip31

customer_reviews.title: Repeat customer
customer_reviews.text: This is my third or 4th time ordering these. We have a wall of nothing but windows in our house and the heat gets INTENSE in summer. So we purchase the Stone colored floor length drapes and I absolutely love them! They look classy. They truly keep the sun out. I will continue purchasing them until every window has one!
customer_reviews.author: Sara C

customer_reviews.title: Amazing blackout curtains and excellent price
customer_reviews.text: These are gorgeous. They are thick and soft and once the wrinkles fall out or I get the motivation to steam them, they will be perfect. They block out all of the light which I needed for the projector screen in my bedroom to be visible. Would definitely recommend and will buy for the rest of the rooms in my house as well!
customer_reviews.author: lydia muller

customer_reviews.title: Blackout for nursery
customer_reviews.text: Bought these on the recommendation of another mom, who said she had purchased 7 different blackout curtains before finding these that actually worked. So I was glad to find them for my baby’s nursery. I think they work so well because they have a black lining. As for looks, I don’t love the satiny texture, but chose function over appearance. I bought the haze color, which is a medium gray with a purplish blue hint. They came pretty wrinkly but that might improve once I wash them.
customer_reviews.author: Up in the Pines

customer_reviews.title: WORTH GETTING!!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING!! In the middle of the day, I can make my room pitch black with these curtains. When I first bought it, i thought it was a paired panel, but it’s not. It’s only ONE panel, so make sure you buy two.. definitely keeps my room cool throughout the day (my apartment is on the 3rd floor and get the sun directly when it’s sundown) so it’s definitely worth the buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Alberto Rosado

customer_reviews.title: High quality, 100% blackout curtains!
customer_reviews.text: These truly are blackout! The quality is superior, and they look much more expensive than the fabulous price Amazon has them for. There were just a few wrinkles in them when I took them out of the package, but they came out quickly after ironing. They drape beautifully. I can't recommend them enough!
customer_reviews.author: Ro

customer_reviews.title: If one can get rid of the wrinkles, then they're very good curtains
customer_reviews.text: The curtains are nice and heavy. They definitely black out my room. I really love the color. However, one negative is that even after washing and drying them, then ironing them, they still have wrinkles. Hence, I have to knock off one star. Otherwise, I hope to have these for quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: Amish Country girl

customer_reviews.title: Best light blocking curtains
customer_reviews.text: These are the absolute BEST light/heat blocking curtains I have ever purchased. I highly recommend these. You will not be disappointed and the color is AMAZING
customer_reviews.author: PAULA  A ROBERTSON

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I don’t usually write product reviews on Amazon, or any other site by that matter. I bought this mainly because I wanted a black curtain for my room, and I truly thought the “100% blackout” line was just a marketing thing. It wasn’t. This has really helped me sleep better when the sun comes up, and has made my bedroom a way more comfortable place to be. If you’re in doubt, go with it. I wouldn’t think twice about buying it again, it’s a no-brainer, especially for the price. Please note that it arrives wrinkly, which I don’t mind, but if you do, I’m sure a steamer or something like that would solve it.
customer_reviews.author: Bruno Lopes

customer_reviews.title: Get right black out curtain rods to block light at top
customer_reviews.text: Love everything perfect except they are not wrinkle free. Had mine up 2 mns and still wrinkled but I didnt buy them for that reason. EXCELLENT PRICE...VALUE SUPPERB. GETS JOB DONE. NO SUN. EXCEPT get blackout specific curtain rods to block light out at top.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty color Haze but
customer_reviews.text: Yes blocks out light, ordered 4 panels one has stitching is shoddy, and loopy machine not working right. hems are all uneven. I would not order this product again,, finish on fabric it is like satin, it will snag and pull apart easy. I will have to fabricate a pull rod for them. They are creased from shipping how do I get this out ? Package says refer to tag on panel there is no tag.
customer_reviews.author: C B

customer_reviews.title: Best drapes ever!
customer_reviews.text: These drapes are absolutely beautiful. They are theater grade so they are thick but not heavy. There is a bit of a sheen to the material but it only makes them look elegant. They are 100% black out. A fantastic buy for the money. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon S

customer_reviews.title: THE Best Curtain Panel I've EVER had!!!
customer_reviews.text: It keeps the light and the heat out- we have east facing windows and I have to sleep during the day. It's awesome!!! Thanks for great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Mel Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Very Soft
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the photo, soft and silky, back lined with black for blackout
customer_reviews.author: Alice Cheng

customer_reviews.title: Careful When Sizing
customer_reviews.text: I receieved these curtains as a gift, and although they feel nice and soft they definitely do not fit due to their rings. Additionally, parts of the fabric are already frayed. Will be returning and looking for a different product.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn W.

customer_reviews.title: Yes blackout!!
customer_reviews.text: Finally found blackout good quality curtains for a good price! I went through about 5 different curtains for my daughters room before I found these. I was a little nervous since the price was so good but they are just what I wanted and long width wise. I got the pink 94 length ones.
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Eloquent with a little work...
customer_reviews.text: Wrinkles are my biggest problem. Ironed twice but still need another pressing. Found ironing the right side of the material worked better. Color is spot on with the picture. Soft, and helps to keep the daylight out about 90%.
customer_reviews.author: Eagles wings

customer_reviews.title: Works! Keeps home cool from desert heat of 115 degrees!
customer_reviews.text: Works! Saves money on summer AC especially out in 115 degree Arizona sun. Buying more
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because i was switching to nightshift and it helped so much!! They are a much better quality than the ones we bought at walmart a couple years ago. You could totally see the difference between these on the right side of the room and the walmart ones on the left. Plan on buying more soon!
customer_reviews.author: Gladys P.

customer_reviews.title: Not theater quality...not even close
customer_reviews.text: Wrinkles forever, short on length 1.25+inch. Bottom seams, sewn uneven creating pockets. Theater quality is a misnomer by far. Had the length and hem been correct, I probably would have kept them.
customer_reviews.author: David PJ

customer_reviews.title: These are true room darking curtains
customer_reviews.text: These curtains are true Room darkening curtains I put a flashlight behind in could not even see through it and they work great to keep the Room dark and keep the heat out.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: High quality, beautiful curtains
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Absolutely beautiful curtains. I bought the mushroom color & it matchs my comforter perfectly. Love the soft silky look. Great price for high quality. The block out is an added bonus. I can actually sleep 30 minutes later. It also helps block out sound. Bedroom looks luxurious now!
customer_reviews.author: mel

customer_reviews.title: Great curtains
customer_reviews.text: These curtains are great, they keep the cold and heat out, and definitely keep the light out of my room now
customer_reviews.author: Scott R.

customer_reviews.title: Love these curtains
customer_reviews.text: Love these curtains. They are slightly shiny but not in a negative way. They were relatively wrinkled coming out of the package and having been hung up for several weeks, however, I’m sure the dryer would take care of it!
customer_reviews.author: Kenna Robertson

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't call these teal
customer_reviews.text: They seem like they would be nice curtains, but I don't think teal is a good description of the color. I would describe them as a forest green color. I was looking for more of a dark teal blue color to match a quilt I'm making. Their color description is the only reason I gave them 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid

customer_reviews.title: Darkness in the Daylight
customer_reviews.text: Curtains work great. Put them in my bedroom so that I could take a nap in the afternoon and they work perfectly. They keep the room dark even though that room has a southern exposure.
customer_reviews.author: James McMickle

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: It’s awesome! I thought the blush color would be bad at covering the light, since it is a light color but it does it’s job of being a black out curtain. I can’t tell if my blinds are open or shut Bc it’s pitch black either way!
customer_reviews.author: Kyla

customer_reviews.title: Great black out but smelly
customer_reviews.text: Great color, great blackout, made the room smell, recommend washing it twice before installing to remove weird smell. Thought the smell was from dog piss in carpet or a dead animal turned out to be the curtain.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Enriquez

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as described. Had to wash to get smell and wrinkles out. But no major issues.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Castro

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Blackouts!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, shimmery drapes, and definitely blackout the light as wanted. Jnfortunately, as with most, I did have to iron them, as the steamer didn't quite get all the wrinkles out for being packaged. Other than that, they are beautiful blackout curtains!
customer_reviews.author: Lori R.

customer_reviews.title: Eh, you know...
customer_reviews.text: I dunno. I guess I can’t blame the curtain, but I’m not satisfied. It blocks the light, but the light still shines through the side and the top. I’m going to tape it flush to the wall. Remember, the actual width will be shorter after it loops onto the rod.
customer_reviews.author: Posty

customer_reviews.title: The curtain has a plastic smell.
customer_reviews.text: I used it for a couple of days and had to take it off. It has a plastic smell. I left it outside my bedroom and don't know how long it will take for the smell to go away.
customer_reviews.author: Ytang

customer_reviews.title: A Sleep Aid for Day Sleepers
customer_reviews.text: It’s keeps the light out and it does help to maintain room temperature. Some light does escape form the tops and the sides but for the most parts , these work great . I had to buy three panels for my windows .
customer_reviews.author: Nastassia

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.text: I love the length and thickness of these. They’re exactly what I needed for the baby’s nursery. Unfortunately one of the grommets were broken in the middle of the panel or I would’ve given them 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: S Versace Kruger

customer_reviews.title: Wrong length
customer_reviews.text: The curtains came a day early which I was really excited about. I started putting them up immediately and noticed that one was about a foot shorter than the rest and now my cat thinks my sheers are a toy. (They stick out the bottom of the curtain) Curtains are the right color and fabric I was expecting and are very nice for making the room darker as I work late and there for stay in bed till around noon. Great curtains, but can’t wait till I get the correct length I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Tommi

customer_reviews.title: Real blackouts curtains!! Beware you're only buying 1 panel not 2
customer_reviews.text: I rate this a 5 star because the quality of these curtains are great. I love the color and these are real blackout curtains. It makes my livingroom totally dark. The only thing I disliked is that I thought I was buying 2 panels in a pack but it only comes with 1 panel.
customer_reviews.author: CATHERINE WEST

customer_reviews.title: These blackout curtains are amazing!
customer_reviews.text: These blackout curtains are truly blackout curtains. I love them! I got them in black and they have made room so dark it just amazing! I need my room as dark as a cave and these deliver. I have Nicetown blackout curtains in my bedroom and they blackout out really well too. But I compared the two and the Nicetown has some light come through during the day. These have absolutley no light come through. They are thick and a great value. I would definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: NadiabyNature

customer_reviews.title: Might buy again
customer_reviews.text: Soooo.. I bought 6 (all new. It did have an option for used) The fifth one had dog hair in it.. so there is no way it was not used but they do block out heatand sun
customer_reviews.author: Lizette

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful quality
customer_reviews.text: Has already helped cool down the room but needed a second one in order to completely cover the area size. But for the price this was not a major issue. I recommend this product but be advised it's best to get two to keep the whole window covered.
customer_reviews.author: tigereyes4322

customer_reviews.title: Great at keeping it dark.
customer_reviews.text: It came with A LOT of wrinkles but a quick steam took them out. I love the curtains and they do a great job keeping the light out! I hit my knee on my nightstand after a trip to the restroom because it was so dark from the curtains!
customer_reviews.author: PC

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Hardly ever write a review but I had to rave about these!!! As a overnight flight attendant flyer who lives in Florida, there are awesome and keep the room cool (as the sun rises in my room). I bought them for my baby’s nursery so nap time is never an issue with light or heat! Definitely a great purchase and they are silky on one side and thick on the other heavy weighted. I suggest using a middle anchor when hanging.
customer_reviews.author: maryanne

customer_reviews.title: Fully light blocking!
customer_reviews.text: Actually fully blocks light unlike other curtains in the same price point. Definitely isn’t wrinkle free, and slight difference in length with the two panels, but good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly J

customer_reviews.title: They have a satin like finish but I love them
customer_reviews.text: I loved the curtains. They were exactly what I wanted for my livingroom. The color was what I expected. They have a satin like finish to them that I wasn't expecting but actually love. They came wrinkle so I placed them in the dryer. The wrinkles fell out a little but they're perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Nice Blackout curtains!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my daughters room..She got her room made over as a Christmas gift.The color is very pretty just as pictured and the room is pitch black in the day time..Definitely worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Marcy

customer_reviews.title: True blackout
customer_reviews.text: They come folded. There are going to wrinkles, spritz with water and put in dryer, ready to hang. Love this brand and truly blackout if you get darker colors.
customer_reviews.author: R. LaPree

customer_reviews.title: Curtains are supposed to come in pairs
customer_reviews.text: I am completely dissatisfied with this product. I opened the package ready to put ot up in my new office only to find there was only one curtain panel! Who sales only one curtain panel! Curtains are supposed to come in pairs and for the price I paid I would have expected to receive two! This is such shoddy buisness practice. I want my money back!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Richards

customer_reviews.title: 100% Blackout!!
customer_reviews.text: These curtains are absolutely 100% Blackout! I turned a loft in my house into a home theatre and I didn't want to sacrifice the windows by blocking them permanently. I had purchased other curtains that claim to be "blackout" but strong sunlight behind will sip through. Not these!
customer_reviews.author: Pascal

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE - AWESOME BLACKOUT!
customer_reviews.text: We've had blackout curtains before that just didn't cut it, these are great! I can't get the wrinkles out from the way they were packaged but they keep all of the sun and a good portion of heat out of our room. We purchased the black ones and they look very sleek and haven't begun to fade away and they've been up for about six months now.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Great at blocking light
customer_reviews.text: They are great. Block out the sunlight keep out the heat or the cold and when you want them open you just throw them open lots of light comes up.
customer_reviews.author: seanstr26m

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased these!
customer_reviews.text: I just put these up last night. Normally, the sun is directly in my face in the early morning. With these, virtually no light came through. So far, incredibly happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Mine still had wrinkles in it from being folded in the packaging but came out. In love with the teal color and matches my decor. Blocks out ALL the light!!! I’m a night shifter so I had to buy another set! Had these for a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Simran

customer_reviews.title: Blocks out all light!
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I was looking for. Definitely blocks light well, and very thick and good quality. My only complaint is they’re so thick it’s almost impossible to get all the wrinkles out!
customer_reviews.author: Christa

customer_reviews.title: Only one curtain in pack and well made
customer_reviews.text: I thought they were expensive for only one curtain there is not two however they are really very well made and quality so I ordered another one haha! But I was not happy there was only one in there.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Moore

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, Good Quality, ONLY 1 PANEL
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful curtains, but 1 PANEL for $30?? Please male it more clear that the package only contains one panel. I thought I was buying $30 curtains for my room, only to realize now that I am buying $60 curtains :'-(. Very big difference.
customer_reviews.author: Sam and Kormasa Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Beware, color is not a blush pink at all!
customer_reviews.text: These curtains are good quality but are not the cor shown or described. They are not a blush pink , they are a deep rose. They clash with carpet that just came in and I have to order new curtains. Hoped it would still work but it doesn't. Money down the drain !
customer_reviews.author: RR12

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: FINALLY ! Block out curtains that work!! One was a little wrinkled. No problem. I'll iron it. Worth it for the total sun block out
customer_reviews.author: LIVAH

customer_reviews.title: Great drapes.
customer_reviews.text: Look nice and hang well. Perfect fit. Light doesn’t show. Great material. Much better than what I could find at my local WalMart.
customer_reviews.author: tnChick & NarcoJoe

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product. I bought 3 panels for two windows in my bedroom. The material is good. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Functional & Decorative
customer_reviews.text: GREAT at blocking out light. So happy with this purchase! Great price for the quality. We’ve had comments as well about how nice/fancy they look.
customer_reviews.author: sbumb

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and soft material curtain for the price. Fast delivery. Would purchase again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Great except for the WRINKLES!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for keeping sunlight and heat out of your room...BUT it is really hard to get the wrinkles out of them without scorching them! They come folded up and when you unpack them they have lots of wrinkles!
customer_reviews.author: RQTX

customer_reviews.title: SMELL HORRIBLE!
customer_reviews.text: Great color, curtains, and are very blackout! BUT OH MY GOSH... the smell is horrible! Can not get rid of this disgusting smell and will probably return for that reason only.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Angeles

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty curtains
customer_reviews.text: These are truly black out curtains. I didn’t like the color - it was more purple than I would have liked. Other than that they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Ncstategirl2011

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for months. The quality is great and I love the color! 100% would recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You want theses!
customer_reviews.text: I love them! It makes my room look like midnight. We have no shade where we live and it get rather hot. So these are a blessing!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Terribly wrinkle when delivered...the black was off with my black decor..didn't blend well..
customer_reviews.author: joan mack

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: They are not noise canceling at all. And the heat wasn’t reduced any from my windows.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Cates

customer_reviews.title: Blackout and no heat!
customer_reviews.text: These are blackout curtains! No light comes through the fabric. Heat? None. I felt the temperature drop as I was hanging them. I have other windows letting in light in the pictures posted but those will be blacked out soon too.
customer_reviews.author: Justin & Stephanie Dennison

customer_reviews.title: The Answer Is Yes!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this curtain is wonderful it is thick and has an elegant classy look love it!!! Get it!! I would lie 😁
customer_reviews.author: Beauty Alchemist

customer_reviews.title: Completely dark in the room!!!
customer_reviews.text: They are truly 0 black out! I didn’t need to have my darling shades up anymore! Love these curtains for my bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Erin L

customer_reviews.title: These ACTUALLY block out light
customer_reviews.text: These curtains block out so much more light than my last “blackout” curtains did. My room is so dark with these curtains. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Jones

product_meta.title: Sun Zero Oslo Theater Grade Extreme 100% Blackout Grommet Curtain Panel, 52" x 84", Stone
product_meta.description: Size:52" x 84"| Color:StoneSun Zero Oslo Theater Grade Extreme 100% Blackout Grommet Curtain Panels provide the ultimate in light blocking technology to keep out even the harshest of light while bringing an elegant urban sophistication to any room of your home. Sun Zero Extreme Blackout technology is laboratory tested to block out 100% of light, reduce outside noise by up to 45%, and decrease energy lost through your windows by up to 50%. Comfort is optimized with thermal properties that help keep summer heat and winter chill out of your home. Hang in your entertainment room to eliminate screen glare and reduce distracting outside noise, or in your bedroom for enhanced privacy and a sounder, more uninterrupted sleep. Sold as individual panels measuring 52" width by 84" length in color flax yellow. Measure carefully before selecting your desired size and quantity. Rod not included. Machine wash cold on gentle cycle. Use non-chlorine bleach when needed. Tumble dry on low heat, using a cool iron as needed.
feature_bullets: Extreme Blackout technology blocks out 100% of outside light
Energy Efficient design reduces energy lost through your windows by up to 50%
Thermal properties help keep summer heat and winter chill out of your home
Noise reduction by up to 35% helps you get a sounder, more uninterrupted sleep
Includes 1 single grommet curtain panel made from machine washable material

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,162 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Material Care Instructions: Machine wash cold on gentle cycle. Use non-chlorine bleach when needed. Tumble dry on low heat, using a cool iron as needed.
